title: Plate separation increases with battery connected

content.question: A parallel-plate capacitor is connected to a battery until fully charged. If the battery remains connected while the separation between the plates is increased, which of the following remains constant?

choices.label: Magnitude of the charge on each plate
Electric field intensity in the region between the plates

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
